bug.author: tobycheese
bug.summary: Profiling changes column names of original dataframe

comments.comment: Same in Python 3.6, every column with spaces in its name is renamed to used underscores in place of spaces. (In my case, that then causes subsequent processing pipeline to fail. Could keep a list of original column names and re-instate them, but would rather profile_report caused no changes.)

The column names are altered as spaces and colons caused errors for some operations. I agree that pandas-profiling should not have side-effects. Either we solve the problems that occur with certain characters or we re-instate the column names afterwards. This issue should also assess the order of the DataFrame does not change.
